title: Dress

adjectives: Appealing to the emotions as well as the eye
Suitable for wear or able to be worn
Pleasing by delicacy or grace; not imposing
Being or in accordance with current social fashions
verbs: To dress, array, or adorn, esp. for special occasions, ceremonials, etc.
Put on special clothes to appear particularly appealing and attractive
To fit out with the necessary clothing; to clothe, put clothes on (something or someone).
To adorn or cover with clothing; to dress; to supply clothes or clothing.
To put clothes on something or somebody.
To dress; to put on clothes; to clothe oneself.
Move in a graceful and rhythmical way
To move with rhythmic steps or movements, especially in time to music.
nouns: Clothing, garments, dress, material.

Clothing is material used to cover parts of the human body for protection against the environment, for comfort and body modesty, and as personal decoration, often reflecting religious, cultural, and social customs.
Clothing is fiber and textile material worn on the body.
Clothes.
Clothes considered as a group.
All coverings designed to be worn on a person's body.
Clothing
Something that can be worn; an item of clothing.
A covering of or like clothing.
A single item of clothing.
An act or instance of putting clothes on.
A covering designed to be worn on a person's body
Clothes, possessions or equipment.
(in combination) clothing
Fiber and textile material worn on the body
Recently bought goods.
Buying goods
The commodities purchased from storeswomen carrying home shopping didn't give me a second glance"
A retailer or shop is a business that presents a selection of goods or services and offers to sell them to customers for money or other goods.
Popular trends.
Fashion refers to styles of dress that are popular in a culture at any given time.
The latest and most admired style in clothes and cosmetics and behavior
Term for a popular style or practice in clothing, make-up, furniture, etc.
The latest and most admired style in clothes and cosmetics and behavior.
Fashion is a popular style or practice, especially in clothing, footwear, accessories, makeup, body piercing, or furniture.
A prevailing mode of expression, e.g., clothing
A formal gown to be worn by women to balls and similar social events.
A ball gown is the most formal female attire for social occasions.
The most formal gown; worn to a ball
Items of clothing; apparel.
Apparel, clothing.
Clothing in general
A one-piece garment for a woman; has skirt and bodice
Frock has been used since Middle English as the name for an article of clothing for men and women.
A one-piece garment for a woman that has a skirt and a body section.
A dress is a garment consisting of a skirt with an attached bodice.
A skirt with an attached bodice

description: A pretty dress, suitable for a ball, party or other similar occasion.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the dress emoji is rendered with a sophisticated, flowing silhouette, showcasing Apple's signature 3D glossy shading that gives it a luxurious, almost fabric-like texture. The soft gradients and realistic lighting highlight its elegant form, suggesting a garment ready for a special occasion. This emoji, with its graceful lines and appealing design on Apple devices, often symbolizes fashion, style, celebration, or dressing up for an event.
